titles: Lessus in funere Raphaelis Thorii medici et poetæ præstantissimi, qui Londini peste extinctus bonis et doctis omnibus triste sui desiderium reliquit, Anno 1625.
author: Aytoun, Robert, Sir, 1570-1638.
publisher: Printed by Edward Allde for Thomas Walkley,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Thorius, Raphael, d. 1625 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
